name: Ginger (MaskedIntrovert)
description:
Where could Mrs. Claus be!

She was helping the sick elves, but she hasn't been back for a while. Actually, it's been pretty quiet around too? Maybe they're having a party without you, Santa!

Time to go looking!

Goal of the Game

  1. There are 15 Christmas Cards that cover what's been happening while Santa's been slaving away at his Naught and Nice list.
  2. And Mrs. Claus is still unaccounted for.
  3. And that's it!

Controls

Being Santa has never been more versatile!

Just ALL of his amazing skills:
Left Shift: Run Santa, Run!
Escape: Quits the game, how revolutionary!
E: To Use doors and pick up Christmas Cards!
F: In case of hard to see spots, use Santa's LIGHT VISION (it's just a Flashlight)

3D Adventure!

  1. Enjoy exploring a world of rooms in a hospital... in 3D!
  2. You can turn real corners and walk around in rooms from a first person perspective.
  3. Hold a button and you can even RUN FASTER! (For a little while anyway, just like in the real world!) Being Santa has never seemed to real.
  4. What could Mrs. Claus be up to? It's up to you to find out!

Unfinished Glory

Real lack of polish to simulate the fact that the developers should have spent more time working on this instead of enjoying the holidays - right on your own screen!

Contest Details

Ginger was based on the three themes of: Frosty's Hat, Gingerbread Man, and Bing Crosby.
